markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Occult Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1333) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 31 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

Your study of occult practices has shown you how to best defend against them. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120) effects.
name: Occult Resistance
